events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation of your software development skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your profile and will be reaching out with next steps soon.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully, and you demonstrated strong foundational knowledge in software engineering.
Thank you for your timely response confirming your availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC to assess your software engineering expertise.
You successfully completed the technical interview, showing strong proficiency in coding and problem-solving.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th to discuss your fit within the company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview confidently, expressing your enthusiasm for joining our engineering team.
We are pleased to extend you an offer for the Software Engineer role; details were sent to your provided email address.
You have accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially started with the distribution of welcome materials and setup of your development environment.
The hiring process for your position is now closed. We look forward to your contributions to our engineering projects.
